TopicTitle: Valentine 5, a modded play on Jool 5.

Articles.Content:
Required mods
Extrasolar(I tested it, it DOES work in 1.11.x)

A way of getting there(FFT, KSPIE, Warpdrives*, Jump drives, etc.)

*Warp drives disqualify you from hardmode, as do jumpdrives.

The Premise

Valentine Has 5 planets, go to each of them and do a landing on either the planet itself(if the planet has a surface) or if it doesnt have a surface, land on a moon(asteroid moons dont count), Similar to the jool 5, however, each of the planets has its own challenges you will need to face if you want to land safely and return back to kerbin.

The rules

Do not use cheat mods(e.g, hyperedit)

You must have landed on: Serex(moon of Heba), Solyth, Fust, Mir, Javine/Deemo(moons of Lomina)

Establishing a base on any planet is recomended, since you will likely need to refuel your ship before coming back to kerbin, but it is not required

Easy mode
Basic Rules, Land on everything on the list
Normal Mode
Collect Science from all the planets on the list and return it to kerbin.

Hard mode
No Warpdrives/Jumpdrives, Collect science, establish a base on any planet, Life support mod is required, and kerbals must be able to remain on the base for a minimum of 5 years, Land on all planets and moons around Valentine.

Super mode
Impress me.

Edited May 29, 2021 by kspnerd122
